items.sentence: A lot of people who have up until now been spending money having a good time now need to be more careful with their money.
Tatoeba gave Imogen of the Internet a fascinating opportunity to compulsively produce a series of extremely short stories.
The other day when I stopped by at a friend's house, it wasn't my friend that came out of the front door, but her husband.
There's no telling what kind of trouble this proposal might stir up. The result is certainly going to be something to see.
A game of basketball was being played, and those not engaged in the game itself were sitting around watching its progress.
I could hear the voices of several other guests who had arrived and were already eating together in the main dinning room.
I don't think Tom will sell me his old car for eight hundred dollars, but he might sell it to me for nine hundred dollars.
Tom's trip ended in Boston where he was involved in a traffic accident and ended up spending three months in the hospital.
Your English is grammatically correct, but sometimes what you say just doesn't sound like what a native speaker would say.
It's very easy to sound natural in your own native language, and very easy to sound unnatural in your non-native language.
